name: Emergency Department
description: Receives and handles emergency cases, accidents, and injuries.

name: General Internal Medicine Department
description: Diagnoses and treats internal medical conditions such as diabetes, hypertension, and cardiovascular diseases.

name: General Surgery Department
description: Performs surgeries and treats surgical conditions such as appendicitis and hernias.

name: Obstetrics and Gynecology Department
description: Provides care for pregnant women, childbirth, and postpartum health.

name: Pediatrics Department
description: Provides care and treatment for children's health issues.

name: Cardiology Department
description: Specializes in heart and vascular diseases.

name: Pulmonology Department
description: Treats lung and respiratory tract diseases.

name: Gastroenterology Department
description: Diagnoses and treats digestive system, liver, and biliary diseases.

name: Nephrology and Urology Department
description: Treats kidney, urinary tract, and male reproductive system diseases.

name: Endocrinology Department
description: Specializes in hormone-related and metabolic disorders such as diabetes and thyroid diseases.

name: Dermatology Department
description: Treats skin, hair, and nail disorders.

name: Neurology Department
description: Diagnoses and treats nervous system disorders.

name: Psychiatry Department
description: Provides mental health care and treats psychological disorders.

name: Orthopedics and Traumatology Department
description: Treats bone, joint, and spinal injuries.

name: Ophthalmology Department
description: Diagnoses and treats eye diseases.

name: Otolaryngology (ENT) Department
description: Treats ear, nose, and throat diseases.

name: Dentistry and Maxillofacial Department
description: Provides care and treatment for dental, jaw, and facial issues.

name: Oncology Department
description: Diagnoses and treats cancer.

name: Laboratory Department
description: Performs clinical tests to support diagnosis.

name: Medical Imaging Department
description: Performs imaging techniques such as X-rays, ultrasounds, CT scans, and MRIs.

name: Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation Department
description: Provides rehabilitation support after treatment.

name: Nutrition Department
description: Provides nutritional counseling and treatment for patients.

name: Pharmacy Department
description: Manages and dispenses medications to patients.

name: Infection Control Department
description: Ensures hygiene safety and prevents infections in the hospital.

name: Intensive Care Unit (ICU)
description: Provides specialized care for critically ill patients.
